about_the_game:
FOOD FIGHTER CLICKER


Food Fighter Clicker is a clicker game to become the best mukbang food fighter in the world by eating fast food and improving your skills. Tap Tap and be the fastest clicker in the world!

DAILY GIFT! Every day you play Food Fighter Clicker you will get an amazing reward.

Eat your favorite food as fast as possible in this mukbang clicker game. Tap and get your fingers ready for this mukbang game to click and tap tap tap fast to unlock amazing skins and many different types of food in these clicker games.

EAT 10 EGGS IN 30 SECONDS! Through the different levels of this food fighter clicker game, you must complete amazing challenges like a figher to have a great time in these clicker games and discover all that Food Fighter Clicker has in store for you.

MAIN FEATURES


● Strengthen various skills such as eating power, chewing, mouth size and stomach size.

● Tap tap to unlock tons of food to make your table more abundant.

● Collect a variety of items such as hair, outfits, dining tables, chairs, furniture and more.

● Test your skills to see how many you can eat in a challenge mukbang.

EAT 10 EGGS IN 30 SECONDS! Through the different levels of this food fighter clicker game, you must complete amazing challenges like a figher to have a great time in these clicker games and discover all that Food Fighter Clicker has in store for you.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04
  • Processor:  Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory:  Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements aren't final

Recommended:
  • Additional Notes: System requirements aren't final

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.9+ (Mavericks)
  • Processor: 10.9+ (Mavericks)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements aren't final

  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz

short_description: Food Fighter Clicker is a clicker game to become the best food fighter in the world by eating fast food and improving your skills. Tap Tap and be the fastest clicker in the world!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
*languages with full audio support
